channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem models a single Microsoft Update as reported by SoftLayer’s private Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) services. All servers purchased with Microsoft Windows retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers by default. Local description A short description of a Microsoft Windows Update. Type: string failed Flag indicating that this patch failed to properly install Type: boolean kbArticleNumber A Windows Update's knowledge base article number.
